text:
#India’s Most Profitable CPSE 

₹35,610 crore Profit After Tax — #Energy #Maharatna #ONGC ranks #1 among all Central Public Sector Enterprises

#YouAreEnergy #EnergyNowAndNext https://t.co/5pFALakmOT
author_name: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC)

text:
#Energy #Maharatna #ONGC declares results for FY’25; posts standalone net #profit of Rs 35,610 crore; final dividend of 25% and highest ever total #dividend of Rs 15,411 crore, #crudeoil #production up 0.9% in FY’25. 
Total Capex of ~Rs 62,000 crore in FY'25.
Drilled 578 wells, the highest in the last 35 years.
Exploration Capex ~ Rs 10,300 crore; up by 25% from FY'24.
Highlights: 9 discoveries made and 8 monetized in FY’25; Crude Oil production of 4.700 MMT in Q4 FY’25.

#YouAreEnergy #EnergyNowAndNext
author_name: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC)

text:
#ONGC posts net #profit of ₹ 8240 crore in Q3 FY-25, declares second interim dividend of ₹ 5 per share. 
Oil and gas production rises for #India's #Energy #Maharatna.

#YouAreEnergy #EnergyNowAndNext https://t.co/7jzo8E0opd
author_name: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC)

text:
#ONGC achieves impressive Q2 net #profit of ₹11,984 Crore, a 17.1% increase. 
Announces an interim dividend of ₹6.00 per share, with Oil and Gas production now on the rise. As #India’s #Energy #Maharatna, ONGC has made a total of 6 discoveries (3 onland and 3 offshore) in FY 2024-25 so far across its operated acreages, including 4 promising prospects (2 onland & 2 offshore) and 2 new pool finds (1 onland and 1 offshore).

#EnergyNowAndNext #YouAreEnergy
author_name: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC)

text:
#Energy #Maharatna #ONGC Posts Consolidated Net #Profit of ₹ 10236 Crore, in 1st Quarter of FY 2024-25. On a standalone basis, profit after tax for Q1 is ₹ 8938Crore.

· Gross Revenue on consolidated basis is  Rs 166577 crore and on standalone basis ₹ 35,266 crore in Q1

· 5 Discoveries in FY’ 25 so far

Since last press release on 20 May 2024, ONGC has declared 3 more discoveries (01 in onland and 02 in offshore) in its operated acreages. Out of these, 02 are prospect (1 in onland, 1 in offshore) and 1 is new pool (onland) discovery.

#YouAreEnergy | #EnergyNowAndNext
author_name: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC)

text:
#Energy #Maharatna #ONGC declares results for FY’24; posts highest ever standalone net #profit of Rs 40,526 crore; highest ever consolidated net profit of Rs 57,101 crore, highest ever total #dividend of Rs 15,411 crore, crude production up 2.4% in Q4 FY’24. 
Highlights: 1 discovery made and 7 monetized in FY’24; Crude Oil production of 5.359 MMT in Q4 FY’24, up by 2.4% Q-o-Q

#YouAreEnergy | #EnergyNowAndNext

text:
#Energy #Maharatna #ONGC Posts Consolidated Net #Profit of ₹ 17,383 Crore, up by 102.6% in 1st Quarter of FY 2023-24. On a standalone basis, profit after tax is ₹ 10,015 Crore (34.1% down).
ONGC has declared total 4 discoveries (1 onland & 3 offshore) in its operated acreages. https://t.co/Ww8ZKR3ntQ

text:
At #ONGC, we prioritize a Resolute #Safety Culture.

As we celebrate our Safety Champions and Safe Installations for Q4 of 2022-23, we salute their commitment. 
In India's #EnergyMaharatna, the bar for safety is set high, fostering a culture that prioritizes the well-being of all. 
Let us recognize the commendable efforts of our Safety Champions, and inspire others to follow suit.
